title: Panic at `DefId::expect_local` when returning `impl Future` type alias from default trait method using `async move` block

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(type_alias_impl_trait)] use std::future::Future; type G<'a, T> = impl Future; trait Trait { type F: Future; fn f(&self) -> Self::F; fn g<'a>(&'a self) -> G<'a, Self> where Self: Sized, { async move { self.f().await } } } fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0-nightly (0eabf25b9 2021-10-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008 commit-date: 2021-10-06 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.57.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'DefId::expect_local: `DefId(2:12723 ~ core[cc79]::future::from_generator::{opaque#0})` isn't local', /rustc/0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008/compiler/rustc_span/src/def_id.rs:234:43 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.57.0-nightly (0eabf25b9 2021-10-06) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C link-arg=-rtlib=compiler-rt -C linker=clang --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [check_mod_item_types] checking item types in top-level module #1 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: trimmed_def_paths constructed | = note: delayed at 0: rustc_errors::Handler::delay_good_path_bug 1: rustc_middle::ty::print::pretty::trimmed_def_paths 2: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 3: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 4: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 5: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 6: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query 7: as rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer>::print_def_path 8: rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer::default_print_def_path 9: as rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer>::print_def_path 10: as rustc_middle::ty::print::pretty::PrettyPrinter>::in_binder 11: std::thread::local::LocalKey::with 12: as rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer>::print_type 13: as rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer>::path_qualified 14: rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer::default_print_def_path 15: as rustc_middle::ty::print::Printer>::print_def_path 16: rustc_middle::ty::print::pretty:: for rustc_middle::ty::ProjectionPredicate>::print 17: rustc_middle::ty::print::pretty:: for rustc_middle::ty::PredicateKind>::print 18: as rustc_middle::ty::print::pretty::PrettyPrinter>::in_binder 19: rustc_middle::ty::print::pretty::::fmt 20: core::fmt::write at /rustc/0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1162:17 21: core::fmt::Write::write_fmt at /rustc/0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:186:9 22: alloc::fmt::format at /rustc/0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008/library/alloc/src/fmt.rs:579:5 23: ::report_projection_error 24: ::report_fulfillment_errors 25: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 26: rustc_typeck::check::check::check_item_type 27: rustc_middle::hir::map::Map::visit_item_likes_in_module 28: rustc_typeck::check::check::check_mod_item_types 29: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 30: rustc_session::utils::::time 35: rustc_typeck::check_crate 36: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 37: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 38: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 39: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 40: ::analysis 41: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 42: rustc_span::with_source_map 43: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set 44: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace 45: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}} 46: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1638:9 47: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/0eabf25b90396dead0b2a1aaa275af18a1ae6008/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1638:9 48: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start at
